Position: Network Engineer Apex Job ID: 919982 Location: Lexington, MADay to Day Responsibilities: + Design, build, and implement network systems + Monitor and respond to complex technical hardware and software problems + Interface with vendor support service groups to ensure proper escalation during outages or periods of degraded systems performance + Provide routine testing and analysis of all elements of the infrastructure + Lead network operations teams and network infrastructure projects with equal vigor, set individual and team level goals, follow-up on progress, foster team work and individual growth opportunities + Assist in life-cycle planning of network environments for internal customers, develop and review procedures for network infrastructure platform in relation to capacity planning, performance, reliability and security + Support emergency operations on an as needed basis 24/7 & respond to all operational needs according to contract parameters Requirements: + Must haves: + 6+ years' experience as a Network Engineerrole with very strong background in network design, implementation and troubleshooting.
